tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  author_id INT,
  topic_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (topic_id) REFERENCES topics(topic_id)
);
CREATE TABLE authors (author_id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_name STRING);
CREATE TABLE topics (topic_id INT PRIMARY KEY, topic_name STRING);
CREATE TABLE articles (article_id INT PRIMARY KEY, article_title STRING, author_id INT REFERENCES authors(author_id), topic_id INT REFERENCES topics(topic_id));
CREATE TABLE citations (citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, article_id INT REFERENCES articles(article_id), cited_by_author_id INT REFERENCES authors(author_id));

CREATE TABLE author_publications (
  author_id INT,
  publication_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (author_id, publication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES publications(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE publication_topics (
  publication_id INT,
  topic_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (publication_id, topic_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES publications(publication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (topic_id) REFERENCES topics(topic_id)
);
